mapper.insert: SELECT newAppkey() INSERT INTO app (appkey,platform,appname,appid,marketid,categoryid,status,apptype,created) VALUES (#{appkey},#{platform},#{appname},#{appid},#{marketid},#{categoryid},#{status},#{apptype},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE app SET platform=#{platform}, appname=#{appname}, appid=#{appid}, marketid=#{marketid}, categoryid=#{categoryid}, modified=now() WHERE appkey=#{appkey}
UPDATE app SET apptype=#{apptype}, modified=now() WHERE appkey=#{appkey} AND status=1
UPDATE app SET status=-1, modified=now() WHERE appkey=#{appkey} AND status=1
INSERT INTO appinfo (appkey,smallicon,created,updated) VALUES (#{appkey},#{smallicon},now(),NULL) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE smallicon=#{smallicon}, updated=now()
mapper.select: SELECT appkey, platform, appname, appid, marketid, categoryid, apptype, created FROM app WHERE status=1 ORDER BY apptype DESC, appname

SELECT a.appkey, a.platform, a.appname, a.appid, a.marketid, a.categoryid, a.status, a.apptype, (SELECT categoryname FROM category WHERE categoryid=a.categoryid) categoryname, (SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(*) > 0) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END FROM component WHERE appkey=a.appkey AND isdel=0) hasComponents FROM app a WHERE appkey=#{value}
